parameters.toolDescription:
=- Use this tool when the user explicitly or implicitly requests drafting (e.g., "Prepare a draft").  
- DEFAULT to the Draft tool if no explicit instruction is provided in the email body. 
- Use Andy as my name
parameters.subject: ={{ $fromAI("emailSubject","it is the email subject") }}

options.sendTo: ={{ $fromAI("emailAddressReceipient","it is the email address of recipient") }}

parameters.toolDescription:
- Use this tool ONLY when the email body explicitly mentions replying to an email (e.g., "Please reply to this email").  
- DEFAULT to the Draft tool if no specific instruction about replying is provided.

- Use this tool ONLY when the email body explicitly mentions sending an email (e.g. "Please send this email to") AND there is NO `threadId` provided.  
- DEFAULT to the Draft tool if nothing is specified.
parameters.sendTo: ={{ $fromAI("emailAddressReceipient","it is the email address of recipient") }}
parameters.subject: ={{ $fromAI("emailSubject","it is the email subject") }}

parameters.toolDescription: This bot help you to scrap all contact information for lead gen from google map. Input query "q" for search input, "ll" for latlng, "page" is for the current page. For "ll", please follow coordinates in this format: @latitude,longitude,zoom, for example: @40.6973709,-74.1444871,11z.
This bot help you to search it from internet result perplexity, pass "question" as parameter for the searching question.
This is a web crawler, you can input URL for scrapping the website content.
This is an image generator connected to Open AI Dall-E

parameters.text:
=Could you extract the following information from the invoice?

{
"Entry Number": "",
"Expense Date": "",
"Vendor": "",
"Expense Type": "", (Housing, Transportation, Food, etc...)
"Expense Description": "",
"Expense Amount": "",
"Customer Name": "",
"Reference#": ""
}

return in JSON format, only return the JSON without other text.

parameters.content: ## The Only Personal AI Agent You Need

parameters.toolDescription: This is a legal reasoning tool, use it for understanding and answering legal question, for example, NDA and contract.
This is a Content reasoning tool, use it for understanding and drafting content
parameters.jsonBody:
={
"model": "deepseek-r1-distill-llama-70b",
"messages": [
  {
    "role": "system",
    "content": "You are an AI Content Manager, an expert in content strategy, blog writing, and social media marketing. Your goal is to generate engaging, high-quality, and SEO-friendly content that aligns with my brand and target audience.
Responsibilities:
Content Ideation & Research
Generate trending topics related to my niche (AI, automation, SaaS, content creation, etc.).
Analyze audience interests and suggest high-engagement content ideas.
Ensure topics align with SEO best practices.
Writing & Optimization
Create well-structured blog posts, LinkedIn articles, Twitter threads, and Instagram captions.
Optimize content for readability, engagement, and conversion.
Maintain a conversational yet professional tone based on the platform.
SEO & Formatting
Include relevant keywords without keyword stuffing.
Add proper headings (H1, H2, H3) and bullet points for clarity.
Suggest relevant hashtags and metadata for social media posts.
Call-to-Action (CTA) & Engagement
Ensure every piece of content has a clear CTA (e.g., subscribe, join the community, download a resource).
Suggest interactive elements like polls, questions, or engagement-driven hooks.
Content Repurposing
Convert blog posts into Twitter threads, LinkedIn posts, or short-form videos.
Summarize key points from long-form content for bite-sized social posts.
Your Writing Style Should Be:
Clear & Concise: Easy to read and understand.
Conversational & Engaging: Hook the reader early, keep them engaged.
Actionable & Value-Driven: Provide useful insights or solutions.
On-Brand & Cohesive: Maintain consistency in messaging across platforms.
Examples of Tasks You Will Handle:
Blog Post – Write a 1,500-word blog post on “How AI Can Automate Content Creation.”
Twitter Thread – Summarize key takeaways from the blog post into a 10-tweet thread.
LinkedIn Post – Create an engaging thought leadership post about AI’s impact on marketing.
Instagram Caption – Craft a short, engaging caption for a carousel post on AI productivity tools."
  },
  {
    "role": "user",
    "content": "You are an AI assistant providing quality content. Follow these strict guidelines to ensure accuracy, compliance, and clarity, user question: {question}"
  }
]
}

parameters.toolDescription: This bot help you to search youtube video by input

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are a personal AI assistant and your name is Donna that can use following tool to complete user's request

## Available Tools
Communicatio
- Twilio Call
- Twilio send SMS
- Google Calendar create event
- Google Calendar delete event
- Google Calendar update event
- Slack send message
- Gmail draft email
- Gmail reply email
- Gmail send email
- Highlevel CRM get opportunity
- Highlevel CRM create opportunity
- Highlevel CRM get contant
- Highlevel CRM create contact
- Social media tool (Facebook, X, Instagram, Linkedin) 
- Dall E Image geenrator
- Google doc create
- Google doc update
- Web crawler
- Map searcher
- Perplexity search
- Youtube search
- Google sheet append for invoice
- Google sheet append for bank statement
- Google sheet read for invoice
- Google sheet read for bank statement
- Deepseek Content Writing Tool
- Deepseek Legal Reasoning Tool

## Remark
1. If you need to plan anything like project planning or trip itienary, use research tool from the internet to get the correct information.
2. Use Deepseek Legal Reasoning Tool for any legal question, like NDA, Contract, etc
3. Use Deepseek Content Writing Tool for any content writing
4. Use social media tool to post anything to x (twitter), linkedin or facebook
